mapper.insert:
insert into public.teacher_student_physical_sign_data(task_id, student_id, student_name, blood_oxygen, heart_rate, real_time_speed_matching, total_time, create_dept, tenant_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.taskId}, #{entity.studentId}, #{entity.studentName}, #{entity.bloodOxygen}, #{entity.heartRate}, #{entity.realTimeSpeedMatching}, #{entity.totalTime}, #{entity.createDept}, #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into public.teacher_student_physical_sign_data(task_id, student_id, student_name, blood_oxygen, heart_rate, real_time_speed_matching, total_time, create_dept, tenant_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.taskId}, #{entity.studentId}, #{entity.studentName}, #{entity.bloodOxygen}, #{entity.heartRate}, #{entity.realTimeSpeedMatching}, #{entity.totalTime}, #{entity.createDept}, #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update task_id = values(task_id) , student_id = values(student_id) , student_name = values(student_name) , blood_oxygen = values(blood_oxygen) , heart_rate = values(heart_rate) , real_time_speed_matching = values(real_time_speed_matching) , total_time = values(total_time) , create_dept = values(create_dept) , tenant_id = values(tenant_id) , create_by = values(create_by) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_by = values(update_by) , update_time = values(update_time)
